name: tempO (itch) (Carson K.)
description:
tempO has you playing as a marble that can slow time and charge a shot in any direction in order to shatter other marbles. Find and collect power-ups to help you achieve the highest score possible!

Arrow Keys - Move
Z/C - Charge ball
X - Back

Difficulty affects your Starting HP/Max HP, the amount of enemies that spawn at the start, and how fast enemies travel. Each difficulty has it's own separate scoreboard, but any difficulty can be played to earn the game's medals.

Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated :)

Enjoy!
